weekly_top_story.headline: India AI Impact Summit launched with $200 billion investment potential
weekly_top_story.summary: Prime Minister Modi inaugurated India's AI Impact Expo 2026, positioning India as a global AI leader while attracting over $200 billion in expected investments and reinforcing the country's digital economy transformation.

stories.headline: US and Iran make progress in second round of nuclear talks in Geneva
stories.summary: American and Iranian delegations completed their second round of nuclear negotiations in Geneva, agreeing on guiding principles for future discussions amid ongoing diplomatic efforts to resolve long-standing tensions.

stories.headline: Tarique Rahman sworn in as Bangladesh Prime Minister
stories.summary: Bangladesh's new Prime Minister Tarique Rahman took oath following his Bangladesh Nationalist Party's decisive electoral victory, marking a significant shift in the country's political landscape.

stories.headline: India and France announce Special Global Strategic Partnership
stories.summary: Prime Minister Modi and President Macron launched a new bilateral partnership in Mumbai to strengthen global stability, boost academic collaboration, and expand innovation opportunities through joint initiatives.
